column1: Wolf was one of the three Dogs kept by Farmer Maggot
column2: a Hobbits of the Shire. The folk of the Marish near the Shires eastern borders were untrusting of strangers and cautious of intruders. Farmer Maggot was one of these
column3: and to protect himself from unwanted visitors he kept three large dogs: Grip
column4: Fang (dog) and Wolf. All three dogs were wolf-like in appearance
column5: which is doubtless the source of Wolfs name. Of the three
column6: circumstantial evidence suggests that Wolf was the largest
column7: and the one who threatened Frodo Baggins when he encountered Maggot while travelling to Buckland.
